mapper.sql: log_id, description, log_type, method, request_ip, time, username, address, browser, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_log
log_id,
description,
log_type,
method,
request_ip,
time,
username,
address,
browser,
create_time,
params,
exception_detail,

mapper.update:
update sys_log
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
exception_detail = #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_log set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, params = #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, exception_detail = #{exceptionDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_log set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
